attributes.action: Iraqi Christians in Danger in Mosul
attributes.additional_details:
The Iraqi Christians are suffering the utmost humiliation and danger in recent weeks with the uprising of the so-called ISIS. They captured the city of Mosul, home to more than a million Christians for more than 1000 years, and they are being forced to leave their own homes, convert or face death.
We urge you to sign this petition to help us provide hope for these people and highlight the situation to the British Government.
